profile.greeting: Welcome to Original Coast Clothing {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc

get_started.guidance: Are you looking submit a video for an existing order or start a new one?
